name: pdf-page-extractor
title: PDF Page Extractor
description: Extract specific page ranges from PDF documents
content:
Overview

This application extracts specific page ranges from PDF documents, creating a new PDF containing only the selected pages. Built using PyMuPDF, it preserves the original quality and formatting of all pages.

Features

  • Extract any page range from a PDF
  • Preserves original page quality and formatting
  • Simple 1-based page numbering
  • Automatic validation of page ranges
  • Automatic installation of dependencies

Parameters

  • Input PDF: Upload your PDF file from stash
  • Start Page: First page to extract (default: 1)
  • End Page: Last page to extract (default: last page). Leave empty to extract to the end.
  • Output Directory: Select or create a stash folder for the extracted PDF

Output

The application generates a new PDF containing only the selected pages, named with the format {original_name}_pages_{start}-{end}.pdf (e.g., document_pages_5-10.pdf).

Use Cases

  • Extracting specific chapters from a document
  • Creating subsets of large PDFs
  • Sharing only relevant pages
  • Removing unwanted pages from a document
command: REPO_DIR="prod_apps_${RANDOM}_${RANDOM}"; rm -rf "$REPO_DIR" 2>/dev/null || true; git clone https://github.com/CamberCloud-Inc/prod_apps.git "$REPO_DIR" && python "$REPO_DIR/python/pdf_page_extractor.py" "${inputFile}" -o "${outputDir}" -s ${startPage} -e ${endPage}
